recipesJson.name: Wild Strorange
recipesJson.author: WalleBiela
recipesJson.description:
!!!Beeing Hasty i immediately improved this with 1% FW Blood Orange. Sorry.
And. OH! 0.5% LA Tart and Sour. DUH!!!
To eager to share a nice discovery.

I sent for some rda's. As i opened the padded envelope i found a complimentary e-liquid.
Strawberry Orange with a creamy note.
As my wife deemed it yummy i thought i try my hand at improving it.
Inspired by Wanes https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/161224 to use CAP Strawberries and cream.
I pulled this out of the closet, my atempt to make an improvement, call it a remix if you wish. 
It's delicious right of the shake. Maby it stays that way.
Cheers.

reviews.text: This recipe has a really nice summer vibe to it.  The orange combo in here is excellent and I get a really good fruity, almost tropical taste.  I did have to make a couple of subs to it for I didn't have a few of the flavors.  I subbed the LA Tart and Sour with TPA's Sweet and Tart and I subbed the Wild Strawberry from INW and used Strawberry from INW. Overall it's smooth and tasty. Thanks for sharing!
